Class NodeSet

java.lang.Object
ca.yorku.cmg.cnsim.engine.node.NodeSet
Direct Known Subclasses:
PoWNodeSet
public abstract class NodeSet extends Object

    Field
    Description

    The factory used to create new nodes.

    The list of nodes participating in this network.

  • Field Details

    • nodes

      protected ArrayList<INode> nodes
      The list of nodes participating in this network.

    • nodeFactory

      protected AbstractNodeFactory nodeFactory
      The factory used to create new nodes.

  • Constructor Details

    • NodeSet

      public NodeSet()

  • Method Details

    • addNode

      public abstract void addNode() throws Exception
      Adds a single node to the NodeSet using the configured factory.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while creating or initializing the node

    • addNodes

      public void addNodes(int num)
      Adds multiple nodes to this NodeSet, by repeatedly calling addNode().
      Parameters:
      num - the number of nodes to add
      Throws:
      ArithmeticException - if num < 0

    • closeNodes

      public abstract void closeNodes()
      Performs cleanup and final reporting for all nodes in this NodeSet.

      This typically occurs at the end of a simulation run. Each node is closed and its statistics are recorded using Reporter.addNode(int, int, float, float, float, double).

    • pickRandomNode

      public INode pickRandomNode()
      Selects and returns a random node from this NodeSet.

      Randomness is determined by the Sampler provided by the associated AbstractNodeFactory.

      Returns:
      a randomly selected node

    • pickSpecificNode

      public INode pickSpecificNode(int nodeID)
      Returns a specific node by its index (ID) within this NodeSet.
      Parameters:
      nodeID - the index or ID of the node from 1 to number of nodes.
      Returns:
      the corresponding IMiner
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if nodeID is invalid

    • getNodes

      public ArrayList<INode> getNodes()
      Returns the underlying list of nodes.
      Returns:
      the ArrayList of INode objects

    • getNodeSetCount

      public int getNodeSetCount()
      Returns the number of nodes in this NodeSet.
      Returns:
      the node count

    • getMalicious

      public INode getMalicious()
      Returns the malicious node, if one exists.
      Returns:
      the malicious INode, or null if none exists

    • setNodeFactory

      public void setNodeFactory(AbstractNodeFactory nf)
      Sets the AbstractNodeFactory used to create new nodes.
      Parameters:
      nf - the node factory

    • debugPrintNodeSet

      public abstract String debugPrintNodeSet()
      Returns a formatted string containing details for all nodes in this NodeSet.
      Returns:
      a formatted string representation of all nodes

    • printNodeSet

      public abstract String[] printNodeSet()
      Generates a CSV-style representation of the node set, where each line corresponds to a node and contains its properties separated by commas.
      Returns:
      an array of strings, each describing one node
